eab72eca-4587-4fe0-ba1f-adddc4884f94.name: 战斗反射
eab72eca-4587-4fe0-ba1f-adddc4884f94.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

3e092028-e60d-4957-b8f9-a35cf9cdfcac.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

7017ceb8-0c9b-4ea5-9ecb-1a3c89f07635.name: @谁：拥有价值 100000 倍这个世界的起始财产的资产的组织@

392e1ab5-99d8-45a4-8458-3eeca7aa2f2a.name: Equipment
392e1ab5-99d8-45a4-8458-3eeca7aa2f2a.notes: @装备的价值不会超过起始财富@

ba017448-9628-490c-be41-3154f55db6dc.name: Equipment
ba017448-9628-490c-be41-3154f55db6dc.notes: @装备的价值能够超过起始财富@

daf8e80d-aff8-48d9-98eb-697fe7a9c600.name: 特殊能力
daf8e80d-aff8-48d9-98eb-697fe7a9c600.notes: @在非魔法世界有魔法力量、拥有来自未来 TL 的装备、给予你特殊能力@

abcba334-8133-4965-8841-97eded67d570.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

194a1ace-573b-438e-8d75-22d3072c8ad1.name: 期待陪伴
194a1ace-573b-438e-8d75-22d3072c8ad1.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

693d11e7-d197-4abd-beaf-c29102192b7a.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
693d11e7-d197-4abd-beaf-c29102192b7a.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

4f84fbfa-5314-4134-a27c-37085c636945.name: Vow (Never refuse a request for medical aid)

7470df20-2fad-459e-94e2-26f274d4b9cf.name: 贪婪
7470df20-2fad-459e-94e2-26f274d4b9cf.notes: 面对任何时候提供的财富——如，工作后的报酬、冒险所得、犯罪的脏物或者作为诱饵的金钱，你需要进行自控检定。如果检定失败，你将尽一切手段得到那笔财富。

8e80ca48-e5b0-497c-b8fa-ccca5aaa33c7.name: Judo
8e80ca48-e5b0-497c-b8fa-ccca5aaa33c7.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
